name: Japanese Class!
description: Start your journey into the Japanese language and culture at Japanese Class! Whether you're a beginner or looking to brush up your skills, our interactive classes offer a fun and immersive learning experience. Explore the basics of Japanese grammar, practice essential phrases, and gain insights into the rich traditions and customs of Japan.

name: Anime Karaoke Night
description: Join us for a night of anime-themed karaoke where you can sing your favorite anime songs! Show off your vocal talents and enjoy the energetic atmosphere filled with fellow anime enthusiasts.
address: 1234 Pacific Beach Blvd, San Diego, CA 92109

name: Cosplay Contest
description: Get ready to showcase your creativity and craftsmanship in our annual Cosplay Contest! Dress up as your favorite anime, manga, or gaming character and compete for fantastic prizes. Don't miss this opportunity to immerse yourself in the world of cosplay!

name: Japanese Tea Ceremony
description: Experience the tranquility and grace of a traditional Japanese tea ceremony. Learn about the art of tea preparation, its significance in Japanese culture, and enjoy the serene atmosphere. Immerse yourself in this cultural experience and appreciate the beauty of simplicity.

name: Anime Gaming Tournament
description: Battle it out in our epic anime gaming tournament! Test your skills against other gamers in popular anime-inspired games. From fighting games to RPGs, this tournament offers thrilling competition and a chance to claim the title of the ultimate anime gamer.
